response.overview: In order to escape his mundane existence, Ali, a 13 year old boy, finds refuge in the magic of his screen. Amidst the quiet whispers of desert sands, "Mirage" explores the unsettling echoes of virtual disconnection.
response.tagline: In order to escape his mundane existence, Ali, a 13 year old boy, finds refuge in the magic of his screen. Amidst the quiet whispers of desert sands, "Mirage" explores the unsettling echoes of virtual disconnection.
response.title: Mirage
